Per-server configs — server owners can customize bot settings individually, including command prefix, XP gain rates, perks, and role assignments.
Database schema refactor — all guild-specific data is now isolated, allowing the bot to safely operate across multiple servers without conflicts.
Config command suite — new commands like `!!setprefix`, `!!setxp`, `!!setperks`, and `!!setchannel` allow server owners to manage server-specific settings easily.
Command/channel restrictions — commands that require specific channels can now be bound per server using configuration settings.
Permissions and access control — enhanced role-based checks to ensure only authorized users can modify server-specific settings.
Testing and stability improvements — verified bot functionality in multiple servers to prevent cross-server data leaks or command collisions.
Stable hosting (VPS/cloud) with uptime monitoring.
